turns.speaker: A
turns.en: Hi Emily, could you help me print the presentation for the meeting?
turns.zh: 嗨 Emily，你可以幫我列印會議簡報嗎？

turns.speaker: B
turns.en: Sure, how many copies do you need?

turns.speaker: A
turns.en: Ten copies, please. Black and white is fine.
turns.zh: 請幫我印十份，黑白的就可以。

turns.speaker: B
turns.en: No problem. Do you have the file ready?

turns.speaker: A
turns.en: Yes, I just emailed it to you.

turns.speaker: B
turns.en: Got it. I’ll print them now and bring them to the meeting room.
turns.zh: 收到了。我現在就印，等等幫你帶去會議室。

turns.speaker: A
turns.en: Thank you so much. I appreciate it!
turns.zh: 非常感謝，真是幫大忙了！
